content:
# I have successfully extracted the 3 copper plates from the furnace. My current inventory now includes:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 5 copper ore
# - 3 copper plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# With the copper plates in hand, I can now proceed to craft the electronic circuits. Each electronic circuit requires:
# - 3 copper cables (which can be crafted from 3 copper plates)
# - 1 iron plate

# Since I have 3 copper plates, I can craft exactly 1 electronic circuit. However, I still need to smelt more iron plates to proceed.

# First, I will craft the copper cables from the copper plates.
craft_item(Prototype.CopperCable, quantity=3)  # Craft 3 copper cables from the copper plates.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting copper cables.
